name: earth-power
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.platinum: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
